ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Shadowknight Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: There s a few options for you.  There s always the boring old combine/well balanced weapons.  But more interestingly, I ve seen several shadowknights go with a
ygData.messageBody:
There's a few options for you. There's always the
boring old combine/well balanced weapons. But more
interestingly, I've seen several shadowknights go with
a bladed thulian claws from aof in cazic along with a
shield. There's also an obsidian scimitar that is a
rare drop off the goblin foreman in sol a. Personally
I think that might be a nice look for a eurdite sk.
Those are the options that occur to me right off the
top of my head. I'm sure there's more and also that
Kunark will bring more options as well.

Atrocity
the Revelation
Tallon Zek

--- scott.mcgougan@... wrote:
> Hello All,
> This is my first post to the list and I have only
> recently become
> interested in the ShadowKnight class.
> I started an Erudite SK with a vision of a shield
> and sword combo. I'm
> learning that starting a character
> with a vision can be quite disappointing! My
> efforts to find a nifty
> magical sword (1H Slash) have actually
> been the thing that has met with disappointment, the
> character himself is
> quite interesting and fun to
> play/ role-play. At any rate, I was wondering if I
> am just overlooking
> something.... Are there ANY 1H Slash
> SK specific weapons that don't come from the Planes?
> I have been watching
> reports come out Kunark,
> and it would seem that NPCs there are only capable
> of dropping 2H Slash or
> 2H Blunt weapons
> (perhaps only a SLIGHT exaggeration :) ). Failing
> SK specific weapons,
> what would the recommendation be?
> ...and sadly, a SS:Ykesha is going to be quite out
> of my grasp for a
> while....
>
>
> Thanks,
> Azamai Ebontide
> of Solusek Ro
>
>
